Content.title: About Me
Content.text:
I am a highly motivated and organized IT professional with a strong background in production arts and computer systems. My experience has provided me with proficiency in lighting, sound, and video services, as well as networking, data management, and data science.
I am committed to delivering high-quality production solutions that exceed expectations. I pride myself on my attention to detail and meticulous approach to every project, ensuring that each aspect is executed flawlessly, from initial concept to final execution. My exceptional problem-solving skills and ability to adapt quickly to changing circumstances make me a valuable resource in even the most challenging situations.
I am dedicated to continuously learning and improving my skills. I stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends and advancements, and actively seek out opportunities to expand my knowledge base. My commitment to personal and professional growth sets me apart from the competition and ensures that I am always at the top of my game.
Overall, my combination of technical skills, artistic flair, and commitment to excellence make me a valuable addition to any team.

data.description: I achieved GCSEs in English Language & Literature (Grade 5), Mathematics (Grade 6), Sound and Lighting in Drama (Grade 7), Media Production with a focus on lighting and scene presentation (Grade 6), and Computing Science (Grade 7).

data.title: Everis
data.description: During an internship at Everis NTT Data, I worked in the banking sector and developed skills in data management. As part of my work, I contributed to the writing of a white paper on a relevant topic in the industry.

data.title: The Brit School
data.description:
I am a proud alumnus of The BRIT School for production arts. I completed the two-year program with distinction and gained valuable experience working on productions such as Shakespeare's "The Tempest" and "Wuthering Heights."
During my time at The BRIT School, I received a comprehensive education in production arts that covered a range of topics, from set design and lighting to sound and costume design. I was able to apply this knowledge to real-world productions, gaining valuable experience in bringing literary works to life through creative expression.
Earning a distinction was a significant achievement for me, and I am proud of the hard work and dedication that I put into my studies. My time at The BRIT School was a transformative experience that allowed me to hone my skills and gain confidence in my abilities.
I am excited to continue pursuing my passion for production arts and look forward to sharing my creative talents with the world. Thank you for visiting my website, and I hope that you enjoy exploring my portfolio of work.
